headline: How the Narrative Around Northern Trust Is Shifting Amid Analyst Revisions and Market Uncertainty
summary: Northern Trust has seen its consensus analyst price target edge up, from roughly $126 to $133 per share, following a fresh round of research reports. This upward revision is tied to the company’s demonstrated resilience in challenging market conditions as well as the ongoing growth in its core business lines. Stay tuned to discover the drivers behind these updates and how you can monitor new developments as the stock’s narrative evolves. What Wall Street Has Been Saying Recent analyst...
